Package controller

Class ImageControllerImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ImageControllerImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageController
    public class ImageControllerImp
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImageController
    This class represents the implementation for the controller.

      his method loops through all pixels in the image, and increases their red, green, and blue.

      Perform histogram calculation based on current image data.

      Combines the image from 3 channels.

      This combines the all the different components of an Image.

      This method is used to combine the channels by the Intensity value of the rgb components.

      This method is used to combine the channels by the Luma value of the rgb components.
      void combineBySepia​(java.lang.String imageName, java.lang.String updatedImageName)
      This method converts an GRB image into a sepia toned Image.
      void combineByValue​(java.lang.String imageName, java.lang.String updatedImageName)
      This method is used to combine the channels by the pixel value of the rgb components.
      boolean compareImages​(java.lang.String imageName, java.lang.String updatedName)
      Compares 2 images.
      void darken​(int increment, java.lang.String imageName, java.lang.String updatedImageName)
      This method loops through all pixels in the image, and decreases their red, green, and blue.
      void dither​(java.lang.String imageName, java.lang.String updatedImageName)
      This method is used to convert an RGB Image to a Dithered Image.
      void filter​(java.lang.String imageName, java.lang.String updatedImageName, java.lang.String s)  
      void flipHorizontal​(java.lang.String imageName, java.lang.String updatedImageName)
      This method flips the image horizontally by swapping each pixel in a row with its corresponding pixel on the other side of the row.
      void flipVertical​(java.lang.String imageName, java.lang.String updatedImageName)
      This method function flips the image vertically by swapping each pixel in a column with its corresponding pixel on the other side of the column.
      void load​(java.lang.String imagePath, java.lang.String imageName)
      This method helps in loading an image to the application.
      void save​(java.lang.String filePath, java.lang.String fileName)
      This method is used for saving the image to a certain file path.
      void split​(java.lang.String imageName, java.lang.String redImageName, java.lang.String greenImageName, java.lang.String blueImageName)
      Splits the image into 3 channels.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage updatedImage​(java.lang.String imageName)
      Update the current image data and notify the view to update the histogram display.
